i1.name: Rebirth
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, upon taking {{tip|death|fatal damage}}, '''Anivia''' {{tip|dispel|dispels}} all {{tip|debuff|debuffs}} and transforms into '''Eggnivia''', while also recovering all of her {{as|{{sti|health}}}}.

'''Eggnivia''' cannot act but gains {{pp|showtype=true|-40 to 20 for 5|1;5;8;12;15|changedisplay=true}} {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}. After 6 seconds, if '''Eggnivia''' is still alive, '''Anivia''' is {{tip|resurrection|reborn}} with {{as|'''Eggnivia's current''' health}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Anivia dispels all debuffs and transforms into Eggnivia, while also recovering all of her health.
Eggnivia cannot act but gains 1;5;8;12;15 ‒ undefined bonus armor and bonus magic resistance. After 6 seconds, if Eggnivia is still alive, Anivia is reborn with Eggnivia's current health.
i1.notes:
* Triggering ''Rebirth'' will break {{tip|tether|tethers}} on '''Anivia'''.
* {{ii|Guardian Angel}} and {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} will take precedence over ''Rebirth''.
* While in egg form, '''Anivia''' is still classified as a champion.
* If '''Anivia''' uses {{si|Teleport}} before she takes fatal damage, the channel is not interrupted and she will blink to her target in egg form.
** All other {{tip|channel|channels}} will be interrupted upon triggering the passive.

q1.name: Flash Frost
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' launches a massive chunk of ice which flies toward the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies it passes through by {{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|20;20 to 40 for 3|0 to 3|type = [[File:Glacial Storm.png|20px|border|link=]] Glacial Storm's Rank|formula = 20%+(10%*(''Glacial Storm'' Rank-1))}} for 3 seconds. ''Flash Frost'' can be recast after the cast time.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Anivia''' shatters the orb, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the detonation and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for a duration.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia launches a massive chunk of ice which flies toward the target location, dealing magic damage and slowing all enemies it passes through by 0 to 3 ‒ undefined for 3 seconds. Flash Frost can be recast after the cast time.
Recast: Anivia shatters the orb, dealing magic damage to enemies within the detonation and stunning them for a duration.
At maximum range Flash Frost detonates automatically.
leveling: {{st|Pass through damage|{{ap|50 to 130}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Explosion Damage|{{ap|70 to 210}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|120 to 340}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
*The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation.
* ''Flash Frost'' can only proc {{ri|Conqueror}} once even if it damages the same target twice.

effects.str:
• Pass through damage: (+ 25% AP)
  • Explosion Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 75% AP)

w1.name: Crystallize
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} all units away from it. The wall lingers as impassible terrain for 5 seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, knocking all units away from it. The wall lingers as impassible terrain for 5 seconds.
w1.notes:
* ''Crystallize's'' displacement triggers in-combat effects by dealing 0 {{tip|proc damage|proc}} {{tip|true damage}}, such as drawing turret aggro, {{ri|Sudden Impact}} and applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* '''Anivia''' is granted an assist if the wall touches an enemy champion.

e1.name: Frostbite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' blasts the target enemy with a freezing wind, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
If the target was hit by {{ai|Flash Frost|Anivia}} or was inside a fully formed {{ai|Glacial Storm|Anivia}} within the last 3 seconds, ''Frostbite's'' damage is {{ccs|doubled|magic}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia blasts the target enemy with a freezing wind, dealing magic damage.
If the target was hit by Flash Frost or was inside a fully formed Glacial Storm within the last 3 seconds, Frostbite's damage is Unknown value: ccs doubled magic.
e1.notes:
* The damage of ''Frostbite'' is calculated once it hits. If the target's mark from being hit by {{ai|Flash Frost|Anivia}} or a fully formed {{ai|Glacial Storm|Anivia}} wares off while the projectile is traveling, the damage is not doubled.
* ''Frostbite'' has a different sound effect when it hits a target for double damage.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  50 as 50 and riot's value 40,40,40,40,40 as 40

r1.name: Glacial Storm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Anivia''' calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds to enemies within, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second. ''Glacial Storm'' can be recast after 1 second.
The blizzard increases in size over {{fd|1.5}} seconds. At maximum size, enemies within the area take 300% damage and suffer a 50% stronger slow which lasts {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

''Glacial Storm'' deactivates if '''Anivia''' gets too far away or she does not have the sufficient amount of {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} to pay for the ability's cost. Additionally, ''Glacial Storm'' will be deactivated by all forms of {{tip|interrupt|interrupting}} {{tip|crowd control}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Anivia''' deactivates ''Glacial Storm'', dealing one last tick of [[damage]].
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within, slowing them for 1 second. Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second.
The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, enemies within the area take 300% damage and suffer a 50% stronger slow which lasts 1.5 seconds.
Glacial Storm deactivates if Anivia gets too far away or she does not have the sufficient amount of mana to pay for the ability's cost. Additionally, Glacial Storm will be deactivated by all forms of interrupting crowd control.
Recast: Anivia deactivates Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.
leveling:
{{st|Magic damage per second|{{ap|30 to 60}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Empowered damage per second|{{ap|30*3 to 60*3}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Slow|{{ap|20 to 40}}%|Empowered Slow|{{ap|20*1.5 to 40*1.5}}%}}
r1.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Glacial Storm's'' slow leaves a trail that is visible even if the target is [[stealth]]ed.
* ''Glacial Storm'' deals 3 half ticks at {{ap|200|267|333}} radius for a total of {{fd|1.5}} normal damage ticks before it starts dealing empowered damage at 400 radius.
* {{tip|Stasis}} doesn't interrupt ''Glacial Storm''.
** {{cai|Devour|Tahm Kench}} '''does''' interrupt (allied and enemy) ''Glacial Storm''.

effects.str:
• Magic damage per second: (+ 12.5% AP)
  • Empowered damage per second: (+ 37.5% AP)

  • Slow: %
  • Empowered Slow: %
